title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross and long-armed cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: The center field contains a large inscription with scattered motifs of birds, a house, and an urn of flowers; with a deep border combining a strawberry vine with other floral elements.
